display_long_description:
Early Access
This content is in early access and may not be close to a completed product yet. Please set your expectations accordingly. Help the developer by providing constructive detailed feedback so we can all work towards improving this content as it develops.
Thank you!

Trading Card Game XR (TCGXR) lets you play any one-on-one card game with your friends without having to be present. You both need a Meta Quest 3 to play.

The TCGXR is not a game, a set of rules, or a set of images, but a framework that allows you to experience great Trading Card Games like Grand Archive.

For your convenience, images can be easily integrated.

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/8T5EyXQVMN

Check out our website: http://www.unicorn-production.com/tcgxr/

If you have questions, feedback or simply searching for fellow players feel free to join our TCGXR Discord community.

TCGXR is unofficial Fan Content permitted under the Fan Content Policy. Not approved/endorsed by Wizards of the Coast or Weebs of the Shore.
Portions of the materials used are property of Wizards of the Coast or Weebs of the Shore.
